entry.name: AstraMilitarum/JopallIndenturedSquadronDescription
entry.value: Marksmen specialising in urban defence and fighting Orks. Costs influence, but generates influnce from fighting. Maintains accurancy after moving, if near allied cities.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/JopallIndenturedSquadronFlavor
entry.value: Jopall Indentured Squadrons, hailing from the Armageddon Subsector, are born into debt. Every soul's purpose in life is to repay their debt, and it just so happens that the Guard offers an enticing salary. Fellow Guardsmen dislike working with them due to their stinginess and lack of commitment, but most change their tune when their assailants are cut down by precise lasfire.
